Language Player is an innovative languag: Umdlali woLwimi liqonga lokufunda ulwimi olutsha elenzelwe ukukunceda ukwazi ulwimi olutsha ngokusebenzisa umxholo wevidiyo obandakanyekayo. Ngendlela yayo yokufunda ekhethekileyo esekelwe kwi-subtitle, i-Language Player ikuntywilisela kwiividiyo eziyinyani ezilungiselela umdla wakho kunye nenqanaba lobuchule.
